actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the trade relationship between the United States and India.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should initiate negotiations to enter into a free trade agreement with India. Urges both countries to continue to pursue multilateral negotiations for a reduction in tariffs, subsidies, and other non-tariff barriers to trade with developed and developing countries.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the trade relationship between the United States and India.
